root.name: Frogger Pinball
root.description: OverviewFrogger Pinball is a pinball game developed and published by Konami on the iPhone and iPad platforms, and developed by Silverball Studios for the Facebook version.Facebook PortFrogger Pinball was released after the iPhone and iPad versions on Facebook. The Facebook version of the game is titled Frogger Pinball Frenzy. Frogger Pinball frenzy was developed by Silverball Studios.In Frenzy, players have a set time limit in which to score as many points as possible. There are certain objectives that can be completed to increase the time remaining.
